definitions.title: n.pr.loc.;—1.
definitions.body: [[סֻכּׂ֫תָה]] ([[ה]] loc.) Ge 33:17, Ge 33:17 (J; expl. from Jacob's making booths), elsewhere [[סֻכּוֹת]];—city E. of Jordan Ju Jdg 8:5 + 6 t. Ju Jdg 8, Jos 13:27 (P); prob. also 1Ki 7:46 = 2Ch 4:17 (reading [[מַעְכֶּרֶת אֲדָמָה]] ford of Adamah GFM:Ju 7, 22 cf. Buhl:Geogr. 206 Benz:1Ki 7:46); ´[[עֵמֶק ס]] Ps 60:8 = Ps 108:8 is Jordan-valley near succôth; on identify. cf. GFM:Ju 8, 5 Buhl:Geogr. 260 GASm:Geogr. 585, add reff.; acc. to Talm. Dêr ‘alla, 1 m. N. of Jabbok Nbr:Geogr. du Talm. 248, so S. Merrill:East of Jordan 385 ff.; LXX Sokxwq (Skhnai/ Ge 33 cf. PsalmPsalm).

[[סֻכּׂ֫תָה]] ([[ה]] loc.) Ex 12:37, elsewh. [[סֻכּׂת]];—first station of Isr. at Exodus, Ex 12:37, Ex 13:20, Nu 33:5, Nu 33:6 (all P); = Egypt. Thku(t) WMM:As. u. Eur. 70, Thkw Steindorff:BAS i. 603; on site v. Naville:Pithom (1885), esp. pp. 6. 23 f. Guthe:ZPV viii (1885), 219 f.; LXX Sokxwq.
